body:
Kinda boring gender bender doujin imo. The gender bender part is just used as an excuse to have the guy and the girl hanging out at the house because they were friends when the TS girl was a guy. They don't show the transformation, the progressive change in mindset from being aware of her new sex, they don't even show what she looked like before.
None of the fun and interesting tropes of gender bender porn are there so if you're a fan of the genre you can skip this one, you're not really missing anything

Apart from that, it's pretty average and looks fine so it gets the job done I imagine, just not my cup of tea
